title: (Tues Full) Listener Wants to Know If You Can Propose with a Found Ring? + Caller Wants to Know How We Handle Lunchbox Off-Air + Bobby’s Most Romantic Songs of All Time
itunes:title: (Tues Full) Listener Wants to Know If You Can Propose with a Found Ring? + Caller Wants to Know How We Handle Lunchbox Off-Air + Bobby’s Most Romantic Songs of All Time
description:
Amy met a listener who had a story she wanted to share on the show to get our opinion. Her now husband proposed with a ring he found in a parking lot. James in Arkansas has a question about how we handle Lunchbox’s cringey situations. Another caller has a question for Bobby and wants to know what the most romantic song of all-time is.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
